queries.query_text: What is the rule about Vesk have a long history of conflict, first as conquerors within  their own star system and later clashing with neighboring  stellar powers such as the Pact Worlds and the Swarm.  Currently, the Veskarium is at war with the Azlanti Star  Empire. Conflict permeates most aspects of vesk cultures,  creating powerful militaristic empires devoted to the bloody  worship of their warrior god Damoritosh. Their brutal history  and militaristic values shape vesk, who often embrace conflict  and value strength, duty, and a personal code of honor.  Individual vesk are just as likely to apply these cultural values  to other aspects of life besides battle, notably in business and  sport, and some vesk might abandon or oppose the ruthless  values enforced by the rulers of their home worlds entirely.  It's up to each vesk to claim their role as a conqueror or a  collaborator—or something else entirely.?
